description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nEmpowered Fireball:
At the start of battle, this creature gains [icons,1968]Fireball. When this creature {ACTION_casts} this spell, it has a 90% chance to {ACTION_cast} it 1 additional time. This effect can occur repeatedly.
name: Destruction Doll
